## Question 1: There will be an object called 'iris' in your workspace. In this dataset, what is the mean of 'Sepal.Length' for the species virginica?

```{r}
library(datasets)
data(iris)
iris.set1 <- subset(iris,Species=="virginica") 
iris.set1
```
